verbose_text: While the activity of resveratrol against Class III HDACs sirtuins is well characterized, it has been suggested that perhaps resveratrol possesses a pan-HDAC inhibitory property and can inhibit HDACs representing class I, class II as well as class IV [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: resveratrol possesses a pan-HDAC inhibitory property and can inhibit HDACs
